seniority_level.evidence: 1-5 years experience required, title is 'Software & Data Engineer' without senior/staff designation, aligns with mid-level IC role

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly includes 'Data Engineer', responsibilities focus on data pipelines, ontology, and integrations within Palantir Foundry

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on Palantir Foundry platform which is primarily a data integration and analytics platform, with emphasis on data lineage and ontology - typical data warehouse/semantic layer work

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of managing people, mentoring, or technical leadership responsibilities; role is collaborative but not leading

primary_cloud.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned in job posting or Pass 1 extraction; Palantir Foundry can be deployed on-prem or cloud, but no specific cloud stated

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned at all

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on data pipelines, integrations, and ontology within Foundry suggests batch-oriented ETL/ELT work; no streaming technologies mentioned

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestrator tools mentioned (Airflow, Dagster, etc.) in job posting or Pass 1 extraction

storage_layer.evidence: No specific storage technologies (S3, Snowflake, Delta Lake, etc.) mentioned; Palantir Foundry abstracts storage layer

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Berthoud, CO; work model stated as 'onsite' in Pass 1; implies must be in Colorado region

timezone_focus.evidence: US-only restriction with Colorado state requirement; no mention of global or multi-timezone teams

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite work model in Berthoud, CO; residency requirement implies relocation may be necessary for non-residents

h1b_friendly.evidence: Visa sponsorship stated as 'must_be_authorized'; citizenship/permanent residency required; no mention of H1B sponsorship

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Work authorization required implies no student visa support; citizenship/permanent residency requirement excludes OPT/CPT

citizenship_required.evidence: Explicitly states 'US CITIZENSHIP, PERMANENT RESIDENCY, REFUGEE OR ASYLUM STATUS IS REQUIRED' - citizenship is one of the acceptable statuses

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type stated as 'full_time' with benefits including equity grants and 401(k) - typical W2 employee structure

benefits_level.evidence: Includes unlimited PTO, equity grants, parental leave, health insurance, 401(k), disability, life insurance - 10+ premium benefits listed

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'exciting challenges' and 'supportive team' but no specific career tracks, promotion paths, or advancement opportunities

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions collaborating with Product Owner and other Software & Data Engineers, suggesting team-based learning, but no formal mentorship program mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotions, advancement, or career progression in job posting or Pass 1 extraction

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring other roles within the company

career_tracks_available.evidence: No mention of IC, management, specialist, or architect tracks; insufficient information to infer any specific career tracks

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between 'Required Qualifications' (must-have) and 'Desired Experience' (nice-to-have); 5 must-have skills vs 3 nice-to-have

scope_definition.evidence: Focused role on Palantir Foundry development, data pipelines, ontology, and integrations; well-defined responsibilities without ambiguity

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 1-5 years experience required for mid-level role; skills (Palantir Foundry, data pipelines) are reasonable for that level; no unrealistic combinations
